name: The Mystery of Lane Manor
overview: A one or two player version of the board game some call Clue or Cleudo. This would be reworked by the original author, Jim Sanders , and other programmers and re-released the next year under a different name, so you get to see it here it all it's primitive glory. It was published in RUN 1984/10 (Issue #10), in the ReRUN Gamepack Disk, and later in the RUN Strategy Pack II.
